hsts-desc: HSTS (HTTP Strict Transport Security) on a per-user basis
hsts-https-tog:
Enable HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS)
Reload this page with HTTPS to change this preference.
hsts-beta-feature-description: This reinforces your security on this website by keeping you secure even after you log out, and assures nobody can spy you during your browsing. With this option activated and a recent browser supporting this technology (HSTS), any security alert is very probably a true attack against you.
